results.title: Effects of metformin on Sonic hedgehog subgroup medulloblastoma progression: In vitro and in vivo studies
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @GENE_SHH @GENE_6469 @@@Sonic hedgehog@@@ subgroup @<m>DISEASE_Medulloblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008527 @@@medulloblastoma@@@ progression: In vitro and in vivo studies

citations.NLM: Fang H, Wang L, Yu L, Shen F, Yang Z, Yang Y, Li S, Dai H, Tan F, Lin J, Sheng H. Effects of metformin on Sonic hedgehog subgroup medulloblastoma progression: In vitro and in vivo studies Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():928853. PMID: 36278239

results.title: Activation of AMPK sensitizes medulloblastoma to Vismodegib and overcomes Vismodegib-resistance
results.text_hl: Next, we tested whether combination of @CHEMICAL_HhAntag691 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C538724 @@@Vismodegib@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppresses @GENE_SMO @GENE_6608 @@@SMO@@@ mutant @<m>DISEASE_Medulloblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008527 @@@MB@@@ cell lines.

citations.NLM: Gampala S, Zhang G, Chang CJ, Yang JY. Activation of AMPK sensitizes medulloblastoma to Vismodegib and overcomes Vismodegib-resistance FASEB Bioadv. 2021 Jun;3(6):459-469. PMID: 34124601
citations.BibTeX: @article{34124601, title={Activation of AMPK sensitizes medulloblastoma to Vismodegib and overcomes Vismodegib-resistance}, author={Gampala S and Zhang G and Chang CJ and Yang JY}, journal={FASEB Bioadv}, volume={3}, number={6}, pages={459-469}}

results.title: HIF-1 inactivation empowers HIF-2 to drive hypoxia adaptation in aggressive forms of medulloblastoma.
results.text_hl: By combining pharmacological inhibition of @GENE_EPAS1 @GENE_2034 @@@HIF-2alpha@@@ with the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a mitochondrial complex I inhibitor to block respiration, we effectively induced Group @<m>DISEASE_Medulloblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008527 @@@3 MB@@@ cell death, surpassing the effectiveness observed in Non-Group @<m>DISEASE_Medulloblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008527 @@@3 MB@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Contenti J, Guo Y, Larcher M, Mirabal-Ortega L, Rouleau M, Irondelle M, Tiroille V, Mazzu A, Duranton-Tanneur V, Pedeutour F, Ben-Sahra I, Lago C, Leva G, Tiberi L, Robert G, Pouponnot C, Bost F, Mazure NM.
